original_title: Richard Clapton And Friends - Up and Down the Glory Road
overview: In a career spanning thirty years and sixteen fantastic albums, Richard Clapton has earned himself a very special place in the history of Australian contemporary music. On 13th August 2001, Richard Clapton along with special guests Garry Beers, Jon Farriss & Diesel performed an incredible show at the City Live Fox Studios.
title: Richard Clapton And Friends - Up and Down the Glory Road
